info.title: ApplicationInsightsManagementClient
info.description: Azure Application Insights client for Continuous Export of a component.

get.description: Gets a list of Continuous Export configuration of an Application Insights component.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more Continuous Export configuration definitions of an Application Insights component.

post.description: Create a Continuous Export configuration of an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: ExportProperties
parameters.description: Properties that need to be specified to create a Continuous Export configuration of a Application Insights component.

200.description: A list containing the Continuous Export configuration definition created by this POST call.

delete.description: Delete a Continuous Export configuration of an Application Insights component.

200.description: The Continuous Export configuration that was successfully deleted.

get.description: Get the Continuous Export configuration for this export id.

200.description: The Continuous Export configuration for this export id.

put.description: Update the Continuous Export configuration for this export id.

parameters.name: ExportProperties
parameters.description: Properties that need to be specified to update the Continuous Export configuration.

200.description: The Continuous Export configuration that was successfully updated.

ApplicationInsightsComponentExportReques.description: An Application Insights component Continuous Export configuration request definition.

RecordTypes.description: The document types to be exported, as comma separated values. Allowed values include 'Requests', 'Event', 'Exceptions', 'Metrics', 'PageViews', 'PageViewPerformance', 'Rdd', 'PerformanceCounters', 'Availability', 'Messages'.

DestinationType.description: The Continuous Export destination type. This has to be 'Blob'.

DestinationAddress.description: The SAS URL for the destination storage container. It must grant write permission.

IsEnabled.description: Set to 'true' to create a Continuous Export configuration as enabled, otherwise set it to 'false'.

DestinationStorageSubscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the destination storage container.

DestinationStorageLocationId.description: The location ID of the destination storage container.

DestinationAccountId.description: The name of destination storage account.

ApplicationInsightsComponentExportConfig.description: A list of Continuous Export configurations.
Properties that define a Continuous Export configuration.

ExportId.description: The unique ID of the export configuration inside an Application Insights component. It is auto generated when the Continuous Export configuration is created.

InstrumentationKey.description: The instrumentation key of the Application Insights component.

RecordTypes.description: This comma separated list of document types that will be exported. The possible values include 'Requests', 'Event', 'Exceptions', 'Metrics', 'PageViews', 'PageViewPerformance', 'Rdd', 'PerformanceCounters', 'Availability', 'Messages'.

ApplicationName.description: The name of the Application Insights component.

SubscriptionId.description: The subscription of the Application Insights component.

ResourceGroup.description: The resource group of the Application Insights component.

DestinationStorageSubscriptionId.description: The destination storage account subscription ID.

IsUserEnabled.description: This will be 'true' if the Continuous Export configuration is enabled, otherwise it will be 'false'.

LastUserUpdate.description: Last time the Continuous Export configuration was updated.

ExportStatus.description: This indicates current Continuous Export configuration status. The possible values are 'Preparing', 'Success', 'Failure'.

LastSuccessTime.description: The last time data was successfully delivered to the destination storage container for this Continuous Export configuration.

LastGapTime.description: The last time the Continuous Export configuration started failing.

PermanentErrorReason.description: This is the reason the Continuous Export configuration started failing. It can be 'AzureStorageNotFound' or 'AzureStorageAccessDenied'.

StorageName.description: The name of the destination storage account.

ContainerName.description: The name of the destination storage container.

ResourceNameParameter.name: resourceName
ResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

ExportId.name: exportId
ExportId.description: The Continuous Export configuration ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.
